means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 克利弗利 Cleverley的变体

sentence.Network_en: She would cleverly pick up on what I said.
sentence.Network_cn: 她会非常聪慧地领悟我所说的话。

sentence.Network_en: He cleverly sowed doubts into the minds of his rivals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他巧妙地令对手心生疑窦。

sentence.Network_en: Seeing how cleverly he had been outwitted he made no complaint.
sentence.Network_cn: 看到自己在计谋上完全不是对手，他甘拜下风。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这有一些英语选择题,大家帮帮忙啊_百度知道 ... 2.honestly 诚实地 3.cleverly 聪明地 4.precisely 精确地，确切地.
中英文对照&nbsp;格林童话_怡心老者_新浪博客 ... breeches 短裤；马裤 cleverly 巧妙地 consent 同意.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... cleverish 有小聪明的 cleverly 聪明的 cleverness 聪明.
JAVA/J2EE, Struts, Spring,... ... a set of------- 一组 cleverly------- 巧妙 internationally 国际.

list.abs: The picture was cleverly restored and showed up its original colouring ., 这幅画已精心修复 , 显出了原来的色彩.
they cleverly hid small lumps of gold in their furnaces .他们狡猾地将小块金子藏在炼丹炉里。
the entire group of and Qing style architecture cleverly integrated with modern technologies , splendid , yong rong hua gui , flavor .整组建筑巧妙地将明清风格与现代技术融为一体，富丽堂皇，雍容华贵，古朴典雅。
he cleverly fenced with the question ., 他巧妙地避开该问题.

entry.tran: 聪明的;聪颖的;智商高的
entry.def: Someone who is clever is intelligent and able to understand things easily or plan things well.

example.ex: My sister was always a lot cleverer than I was...
example.tran: 我妹妹向来比我聪明许多。

entry.def: A clever idea, book, or invention is extremely effective and shows the skill of the people involved.

example.tran: 构思巧妙、扣人心弦的小说

example.ex: A colleague of mine in Milan devised the following very clever little experiment.
example.tran: 我在米兰的一个同事设计了下面这个非常巧妙的小实验。

entry.tran: 聪明过头的;过分聪明的
entry.def: If someone is too clever by half, they are very clever and they show their cleverness in a way that annoys other people.

example.ex: His many admirers describe him as clever: his enemies as too clever by half.
example.tran: 崇拜他的人很多说他聪明;恨他的人则说他聪明过了头。

auth_sentence.content: Just innovate and build and expand faster and more cleverly!
auth_sentence.res_content: Just innovate and build and expand faster and more cleverly!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just innovate and build and expand faster and more cleverly!

auth_sentence.content: The duty had been faithfully and cleverly performed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The duty had been faithfully and cleverly performed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The duty had been faithfully and cleverly performed.

auth_sentence.content: The horse-brand...had been 'faked' or cleverly altered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The horse-brand...had been 'faked' or cleverly altered.

Sentence.sentence: Roberts cleverly pointed out that when you are first learning something, you are better off working alone than practicing with other people

sentences.en: He dodged cleverly when she threw her shoe at him.
sentences.cn: 她用鞋子砸向他时,他机敏地闪开了。
他巧妙地表达了自己的想法。
他巧妙地哄骗了捕捉他的人。

sentences.en: She was wearing a low strapless dress that hugged her curves cleverly.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一件紧贴着她的身体的曲线的低胸露肩连衣裙。
